alert.note: Alert for Clark; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 10:46PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Meade and northwestern Clark Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1046 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Meade State Park, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fowler around 1105 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Minneola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southwestern Kansas.
